basics.name: Mike Mitchel
basics.label: Senior Developer
basics.summary: Highly skilled Senior Developer with six years of expertise in software development and a passion for crafting best practices code that delivers exceptional results.

highlights: Guided successful projects as the Principal Consultant for client stakeholders, delivering high value software and tooling.
Managed and mentored team members as a Senior Team Lead
Performed resource management and technical recruiting interviews
Championed and delivered best practices code
Delivered clean, readable, and maintainable code complete with tests
Automated testing via Continuous Integration and Deployment
Maintained documentation and best practices for the codebase
